traits.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: The archon's weapon attacks are magical. When the archon hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 3d8} radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The archon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its understanding of justice.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: One Being
entries: Though it appears as a humanoid creature riding a mount, an archon is a single being. The "rider" can't be dismounted, and no other means can separate the two portions of the archon's being short of its death.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes two attacks: one with its sword and one with its claws.

actions.name: Sword
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8 damage) radiant damage.
